fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hush-Hush: Open a whisper channel with anyone. Can be used at any time, including night.
- Listen to me!: Cast one extra vote for any player. 1 use per day.
- Shush: Deal a basic attack to any player at night. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- May use abilities while dead.
- Cannot be muted or shushed by any role ability or passive.
